#summary OpenXsensor Home

https://openxsensor.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/OXS_Logo.png


OpenXsensor is the evolution of [https://code.google.com/p/openxvario/ OpenXvario] and extends it to multi-sensing applications.

Discussion about this project: http://openrcforums.com/forum/viewforum.php?f=86

Based on an Arduino platform, it connects to different sensors and transmits the measurements via FrSky telemetry capabilities.

It is both compatible with the D series receivers (HUB protocol) and the new X series rx (Smart Port protocol).


===Usable sensors :===
 * pressure (MS5611)
   * altitude
   * vertical speed
 * voltage
 * current
 * RPM
 * temperature
